entry.title: New IRC name: aschildbach
entry.summary: The author of the message has announced that they have changed their name on freenode (IRC). They have renamed themselves to 'aschildbach' from their old name 'Goonie'. It is mentioned that the new name will be used for Bitcoin-related purposes. The message is signed with a PGP signature using GnuPG v1.4.14 (GNU/Linux) version. There is no further information provided in the context.
